children.label: Prompt
children.defaultText:
Write a restaurant review based on these notes:

Name: The Blue Wharf
Lobster great, noisy, service polite, prices good.

Review:

children.label: Sample response
children.defaultText: {{createRestaurantReview?.data?.text ?createRestaurantReview?.data?.text :`I recently visited The Blue Wharf and had a great experience. The lobster was especially delicious - definitely worth the visit! The only downside was that it was quite noisy. However, the polite service more than made up for it. Prices were also very reasonable. Highly recommend!`}}

children.text: To use, you need to generate your own key,the instruction is at the link  ⇥
